name: customer churn prediction
content: Training machine learning model to identify customers who are at risk of churning. Knowing possibility to churn of high value customers beforehand enables businesses to proactively take actions to retain customers and prevent possible loss

name: fake news detection
content: Implementation of machine learning model to automate fake news detection. With such automation, news authenticity can be figured out early which could save news readers valuable time and reduce negative effects from decisions made based on fake news
